tool_description: JoJ Web Search API allows users to search the world's information, including webpages and related keywords.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Performs a web search based on the provided query and optional parameters.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query. You can use Google Search parameters. For example: `adele site:youtube.com`, `harry potter filetype:pdf`, `inurl:store`, `ronaldo -cristiano`.

optional_parameters.name: related_keywords
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether to show related keywords. Default is `false`. Setting it to `true` may increase API latency.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of results to return. The maximum recommended value is `300`.
